divs: sighting detailsi was driving to my friends house and i saw a huge bright yellowish\whitish kind of like a headlight star shaped circle in the sky. after ten seconds, in a millesecond, it dissappeared. i saw another when i got home, and it stayed for about 5 minutes, my mom has seen it for the past 3 days coming and going.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Acworth
There were no other sightings in Acworth on or around January 31st 2009
